species.name: oricorio
descriptions: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.
It wins the hearts of its enemies with its passionate dancing and then uses the opening it creates to burn them up with blazing flames.
This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer gives the wrong order, this passionate Pokémon becomes fiercely angry.

abilities.name: dancer
abilities.effect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
